籤詩版本二:
Kana mvura yakareba yechirimo ichitanga kuchena, iyo Jade Rabbit neGoridhe Crow zvishoma nezvishoma zvinopenya
Zvinhu zvekare zvinonyangarika uye zvitsva zvinooneka.Tarisa ugosangana negedhi reshato.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chemvura yakareba uye chiedza chekutanga.
Zvose zvinofamba sezvakarongwa.
解曰: Akadzivirirwa namwari uye maBuddha. Hapana ngozi yenjodzi. Rwendo ngaruve nerunyararo. Dzoka nokukudzwa pakupedzisira.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Jiang Taigong anosangana naMambo Wen
Zhou Dynasty. Jiang Shang, zita rekuremekedza Ziya. Ji vanhu (kubva kuXuzhou muEast China Sea). Zita rechiTao ndiFei Xiong, uye madzitateguru ake akaiswa chisimbiso muLu (zita renzvimbo), saka anonziwo Lu Wang.
Kuti adzivise nguva dzinonetsa dzaMambo Zhou weShang Dynasty, aigara pedyo nemvura yeEast China Sea uye airedza muRwizi rweWeishui. Chiredzo chakatwasuka, chinangwa chake hachisi chekuredza, asi kuti ave mutungamiriri wehurumende ane hunhu.
Mambo Wen weZhou akanzwa kuti akanga akachenjera ndokumupinza basa semudzidzisi wake (mutungamiri wehurumende). (Aiva nemakore makumi masere panguva iyoyo) Gare gare, Mambo Wu weZhou akarwisa Mambo Zhou, akaparadza Humambo hweShang, uye akatanga Humambo hweZhou. Mambo Wu akamudaidza kuti Shangfu. Mwanakomana wake Ding Gong akapihwa zita rekuti Marquis weQi.
(Chinangwa cheiyi nyaya: Jiang Taigong, anga akamirira kubata hove paRwizi Weishui kwenguva yakareba, akazobuda mudambudziko ndokushandiswazve naMambo Wen.)
聖意: Mumba Zhongping pachake anonamatira makomborero nepfuma.Kana pasina dhiri muchato unongoitika.Liujia madzimai anofamba netsoka anovharisa munda,makonye anovharisa mombe nhanhatu,anovharisa kutsvaga munhu,kunonoka kumhan'arirwa uye kutama, rombo rakanaka yakarasika pfuma, chirwere, uye makuva muXingxing Mountain.
